document.full_text: the red sox lost their sixth in a row when the cleveland indians squeezed home the only run in the eighth inning, then trapped pinch-runner darnell mcdonald off second base for the final out.
document.title: indians 1, red sox 0: red sox slip to 0-6
lines_and_colors: the red sox lost their sixth in a row when the cleveland indians squeezed home the only run in the eighth inning, then trapped pinch-runner darnell mcdonald off second base for the final out.
